transArray.content: Extra beds are not allowed and it is a bit crowded with children, but the TV is large, screencasting is easy to use, and the network is good. Ordering takeout is more convenient and easy to deliver, and a small robot will deliver it to the door of the room.

Thank you for your patient review. No matter how hard you work, you will reap the rewards. My friends are very happy that the hotel can be recognized by you, and they are more positive at work ~ I love you ~
